content.text: 2 cups boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 cups boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced" )
( ing-2 "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-3 "1 cup shredded Pepper Jack cheese" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Slice the top off of each bun, saving the tops.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Slice"@3:8 / AC
		:source ( ing-0 "each bun"@24:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the top"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "saving the tops"@34:49 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Hollow out each bun, leaving a shell.
3) In a medium bowl combine chicken, cream cheese, Pepper Jack cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic and spinach.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chicken"@28:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cream cheese"@37:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "Pepper Jack cheese"@51:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "Parmesan cheese"@71:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic"@88:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "spinach"@99:106 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Spoon mixture into each bun, packing it tightly; cap with bun tops.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Spoon"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "mixture"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-4-0 "packing it tightly"@32:50 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( "each bun"@22:30 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cap"@52:55 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "bun tops"@61:69 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Wrap each bun tightly in foil.
6) Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "20 minutes"@30:40 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
